Plot: A new clue to the whereabouts of a lost treasure rekindles a married couple's sense of adventure -- and their estranged romance.
Title: Fool's Gold
Writer: John Claflin (screenplay), Daniel Zelman (screenplay), Andy Tennant (screenplay), John Claflin (story), Daniel Zelman (story)
Actors: Matthew McConaughey, Kate Hudson, Donald Sutherland, Alexis Dziena
tomatoConsensus: With little chemistry among the performers, humorless gags, and a predictable storyline, Fool's Gold fails on every level.
